text: Tender Is the Night is a 1962 American drama movie directed by Henry King and based on the 1934 novel of the same name by F. Scott Fitzgerald. It stars Jennifer Jones, Jason Robards, Joan Fontaine, Tom Ewell, Cesare Danova and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1962 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Tender Is the Night (movie)
